Food critics call Lo-Lo's Chicken and Waffles the best soul food restaurant in the Valley. And Larry "Lo-Lo" White's fried chicken and golden brown waffles back up those claims. The amiable family restaurants have been celebrated in publications from the Arizona Republic to the Phoenix Magazine.
Every Lolo's restaurant serves chicken and waffles all day, but Lo-Lo's also offers Southern favorites such as catfish, chicken gizzards, collard greens, grits, and the cheesiest macaroni in town.
Who's Hungry
Lo-Lo's is a celebrity favorite and has been frequented by guests including Muhammad Ali , Amare Stoudemire, Charles Barkley, and more... More In The News
